name: Garden Path
description:
This gently curving garden path tempts you leisurely forward, as each trellis arch presents a different colored flower, each as beautiful and fragrant as the last. Stroll along the path and enjoy the scent of the sun-warmed blooms.

This walkway borders the Rose Garden inside Descanso Gardens, in La Cañada Flintridge, CA. Photo taken on a gorgeous sunny day in May 2019.

#5 in the "Inviting You Through" series, a collection of windows, archways, and covered passages, which will invite you to look or travel through them, to see what's on the other side, or simply enjoy the journey of getting there.
